entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
